exec: var keyapi = CryptoJS.MD5( CryptoJS.MD5(pm.environment.get("email") + pm.environment.get("appreg")) + json.tokenapi).toString();

        "auth_type_smtp": 256,

        "server_path_caldav": "/caldav/v2/",

        "useSSL_caldav": 1,
        "useKerberos_caldav": 0,
        "auth_type": 256,
        "account_type": 1,

}]
